body_html:
Hi guys,

Sorry for a delay on this.

There was no bias term in the original paper by Baudanau https://arxiv.org/pdf/1409.0473.pdf (see page 14). This change will break existing models that uses "bahdanau" attention, so I will oppose this change.
(The author of this PR also acknowledged that he/she misread the paper).

If people would like to have bias in the attention, I'd recommend using normed_bahdanau instead. See https://github.com/tensorflow/nmt#hyperparameters.

-Thang
